summary: Small role-play quest / adventure mod adding few hours to your gameplay. Three fully voiced followers. Over 3000 dialogue lines. Five different endings. It's own story. It's own world, misteries and secrets to discover.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Tahoma][size=2]
[i]There are many quests
"Go, kill, return"
or
"Go, find something, bring it back"

This mod rewards you for not doing this...
...properly


[/i]
[/size]


[/font][/center][font=Tahoma][size=2]
[u][center]What is this mod?[/center][/u]
- This is small, pathetic and not funny at all, role-paly quest/adventure mod
- It was designed as an extension of [url=http://en.uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:The_Way_of_the_Voice]MQ105[/url]﻿ (on your way to HH)
- But you can start it whenever you want, no new game required
- It adds four fully voiced followers, each one is different
- Three of them have their own unique custom voice, babe has vanilla voice
- They have their own lifes, their own stories to tell, their own feelings (or no feelings at all)
- Over 3k voiced dialogue lines
- Over 10 main quests and lot of side quests
- Each quest you can do in several different ways
- It adds few hours to your gameplay, depends on your play-style
- Lore-friendly story
- You can chose your own path, decide what you want to do. Consequences included
- There are 5 different endings, depending on your decisions
- Only one ending leaves everyone alive. The rest? Well...
- You can be killed as well. Many times. Watch what you're saying
- If you're gonna be rude for actors or if you make a wrong decision - they may leave you forever
- This mod allows you to kill/save some vanilla actors in a very lore-friendly way
- You can also start some vanilla quests in a very different way than usual
- It has it's own <True>/<Lie> system. Key decisions are marked by <xxx>
- Many 'easter-eggs' reffering to well known mods / movies / games / characters / movie quotes and so on
- Tons of additional dialogues if you [u]think before you act![/u]

[u][center]It sounds interesting. Tell me more![/center][/u]
- Story script took over 2 months to make and maaaany sheets of paper
- Very rich content, every single thing is placed not by accident, it all has it's meaning
- Many simple things like rings, amulets, books, has it's own background story
- OMG WHO CARES ABOUT IT???
- TELL ME WHERE THE HELL IS DARKHORN'S DAUGHTER??

[u][center]How to start?[/center][/u]
- Meet Dar'Salli, he's sitting by a campfire near Ivarstead
- Light the campfire for more immersion!
- Be carefull and make sure you're interesting enough for him
- He will ask you to do a favour - find a book and bring it back
- Will you do it?
﻿- You can find a book and bring it back
﻿- You can ignore it
﻿- You're going to meet someone
﻿- You can ignore him and go for book
﻿- You can try to save him
﻿- With or without success
﻿- You can try to steal this book
﻿- on your own
﻿- or with a little help
[b]What decision will you make?[/b]

[u][center]Starring:[/center][/u]

[b][u]Dar'Salli[/u][/b]
Race: Khajiit
Voice: Dar'Salli's Voice (custom)
Age: Uknown
Class: Uknown
Combat Style: Uknown
Location: last seen near Ivarstead
Essential: try your luck ;)
Marriable: No

[u]Known informations:[/u]
- They call him "High Priest"
- or "Shadow"
- or "Death Itself"
- Some people saw him using electric magic
- He always fight with some... creature... by his side
- He can bring dead back to life
- [i]"He can say something and it is done"[/i]

[u]Dar'Salli as a follower[/u]
- He becomes your follower right after the Prologue, but only for limited time
- You must complete the storyline, sided with Dar'Salli
- It's extremely hard to make him your follower
- But he's worthy of your effort
- No tips, sorry
- Ok, just one
[i]- 'So take my strong advice, just remember to always think twice'[/i]


[u][b]Darkhorn
[/b][/u]Race: Nord
Voice: Darkhorn's Voice (custom)
Age: Uknown
Class: Warrior
Combat Style: 2H Hammer
Location: Ivarstead Bridge
Essential: No, he can be killed
Marriable: No

[u]Darkhorn as a folower[/u]
- He can become your follower fairly early in the game
- Getting him as a follower is hard, you have only one chance
- Tip - you must really, really, really want to save him


[b][u]Hildi
[/u][/b]Race: Nord
Voice: Hildi's Voice (custom)
Age: He's young
Class: Bard
Combat Style: Uknown
Location: Solitude Row, right next to Bard's College
Essential: No
Marriable: Yes

[u]Hildi as a follower
[/u]- First you must complete the storyline, sided with Dar'Salli
- Dar'Salli's side has 3 different endings. Only one unlocks Hildi
- Darkhorn's side won't let you get Hildi as your follower
- Tip - At the very very end - use your brain, not emotions


[b][u]Lena[/u][/b]
Race: Nord
Voice: Female Sultry (Vanilla)
Age: 18
Class: Ranger
Combat: Bow / 1h
Location: Bannered Mare
Marriable: Yes
Essential: Yes

[u]Lena as a follower:[/u]
- She becomes your follower after one of main quests
- She's a reference to [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/80959]Luna

[/url][/size][/font]
